google_play_reviews.content: the game is fun addictive and challenging however i can't see what's the meaning of my enchant effect on my armor please add an analouge so that we or i can see what is the meaning of my enchant, also the save and load option is not a good thing to add in the game like this save and load feature feels like a cheat to me and cheating is not a good thing on a game save and load feature can use even if its offline so there's no adds and can be used as an advantage, i hope you can fix this.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello and thank you for your feedback. The enchants are similar to the original game and their effect is a mystery for you to learn. However, the in-game libraries can contain some more detailed information on different enchants üôÇ As for saving, it is totally optional and you can enjoy the normal mode without saves, at any time!

google_play_reviews.content: there seems to be a clone called Shattered Dungeon... in not sure if this is the clone or the other game but someone has copied someone and that makes this game less unique. it is however very fun but i just thought it might be important for you to know about Shattered Pixel ans their game called Shattered Dungeon that has alot of the same skins, dungeon details, gameplay is even super similar.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello and thank you for your feedback! Both Shattered and Remixed are based on the original Pixel Dungeon game and therefore, share a lot of similarities. We are definitely aware of other forks and highly suggest that you try them as well. Such as YAPD, Moonshine PD, Deistic PD, Sprouted PD and many others!

google_play_reviews.content: 10/10 it's very fun you especially in the epic bmod with takes likesecond to add you feel like a god then BOOM your basically nothing makes the player use a lot more tactics I doubt people are using the base game
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your review!

google_play_reviews.content: In terms of a pixel dungeon game, it's meh. I really dislike the whole cinema and cosmetics thing. The original, shattered, yet another, etc., pixel dungeons pride themselves as being only fundable directly with no real rewards. I understand why you would do it differently, but still. Other than that, I like your ideas and consepts. It just could be a smudge better.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello and thank you for your feedback! Remixed Pixel Dungeon is more oriented towards becoming a roguelike RPG in the end, as well as a modding platform. As for the cosmetics, ads and cinema - people need to pay the bills :) But we perfectly understand that it might be a big push-off for some people.

google_play_reviews.content: The game is very fun but the elf class feels unplayable, you start with too few arrows and arrows are too expensive to buy in the beginning of the game, most of the combat is with the dagger he starts with, but due to his lower proficiency with melee weapons he ends up missing most of his attacks and does not do reliable damage. His magic arrow spell would be a good fall back, but mana isn't easy to get once it's spent and it costs half the mana bar to use the spell once.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello and thank you for the feedback. The elf was always a bit behind in terms of power, so if you have any suggestions on how to improve him as a whole, please let us know

google_play_reviews.content: Really fun game with some good modifications of the original. I'd like it a lot better if I didn't randomly lose my save data(I really like playing as the Warden, but have to unlock it again) and there are some minor bugs here and there. If I lose save data again I'll just try a different modded dungeon app.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for review and issue report. Sorry for inconvenience caused. Enabling Google Play Games may help while I investigate this bug. Also any additional details how this happen?

google_play_reviews.content: A damn fine game
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Glad to hear that!

google_play_reviews.content: Adds a lot of great stuff to the original: Weapons actually visible on character, surface village, optional dungeons (Spiders!), more equipment, more classes, difficulty levels and, most importantly, hats. 10/10

google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello! The bug was reported and fixed. However, the issue with spawn will remain for old save files. Sorry for the inconvenience and thank you for the workaround suggestion, that will sure come in handy for some players that faced a similar issue

google_play_reviews.content: Game keeps removing my post. The game is copying Shatterd Pixel Dungeon check even the assets. They are copies
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Both Shattered and Remixed (and many others) are legitimate forks of Pixel Dungeon by watabou licensed under GPLv3 license. Since both games were forked from Pixel Dungeon, it is normal that assets from the base game will be shared among forks

google_play_reviews.content: I really like the new content and it fits in well. My biggest complaint is the UI. Shattered Pixel Dungeon has an amazing feel. However, if you're unwilling to change it to feel like shattered, at least make enemies and allies wait if you order them to go somewhere instead of rerouting a new way around! For example, if I was in a narrow hallway, a snail on my right and my deathling on my left, if I would command it to attack the snail, it would go around a new way, which is very frustrating.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello and thank you for the review! Might you have any suggestions regarding the UI? Would really like to hear them out, since some additional QoL changes would be a good addition. And as for the mobs, we will try to think of some alternatives on how you can manage them. Maybe adding stances for mobs? (passive, aggressive, defensive)

If there is something specific you would like to suggest - please let us know.

google_play_reviews.content: A fun excersize on the evils of unchecked capitalism. In this tale I, the adventurer and in this town the bulk of the working class, am subject to the ludacris prices set by the shop owner. He basically owns me because he has a monopoly, being the only shop in town. I thought I could escape his ludacris prices by delving deeper to find other merchants but clearly they're all in Cahoots because the lower you go, the higher the prices on the same goods. Please add more vendors!!
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Thank you for detailed review.
Merchants however won't stop on anything to enforce their monopoly...

google_play_reviews.content: Really fun pixel dungeon! The spider levels were pretty difficult but beating them was really rewarding, and I love the auto save system. I have run into an issue though. I beat the spider queen and unlocked the portal, but when I go through the portal it takes me to the first floor of the spider caves. I've combed the whole level and I cant find another way down. Theres a high chance that i just missed it but I'm not sure what to do next.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Return to lvl 5 and look for another way down.

google_play_reviews.content: I've played just about all the different pixel dungeon games out there and this is by far the best. It has a save/autosave feature so you dont lose hours of gameplay due to stepping on a fire trap. Even with the save feature it still requires a lot of skill to get far in the game. The bosses are very challenging, but beatable. I just cleared the 3rd boss after my 6th try, when he died I felt like I'd really accomplished something in the game. You can even watch optional ads to get 150 free gold.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for great and so detailed review.

Thank you for review anyway.

google_play_reviews.content: Very enjoyable. A bit tougher in some ways than other pixel dungeons, but lots of special quirks that make it my go-to roguelike on Android.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for great review.

google_play_reviews.content: Fun and easy to learn. My favorite new time killer. Enjoying the challenges each floor or run gives. I play as the gnoll and it's the reason I love playing. Needs away to enchant weapons easyer for other characters.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for great review and suggestions.

google_play_reviews.content: Wands have stopped recovering charge since the last update! I hope it can be fixed soon! All in all a simple to play yet complex and highly addictive game. It's never the same twice so you can play again and again for years. Updated to 29.5.rc.2 and the issue persists.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Please try update to 29.5.rc.2

google_play_reviews.content: The game is over all great. The enemies are fun to fight and the system for the fighting is...ok. There are some really irritating things with the user interface, like moving by tapping. Please make an optional control scheme. Like allow the player to use a D-pad. And the leveling system needs some work as well, you level up but dont get points to distribute. Whats even the point of haveing a player class then if you can't make your player have the strenghts and weaknesses you want it to. Thanks
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank  you for review and suggestions.
